articles.author: Nancy Lapid
articles.title: Texas bird flu strain kills ferrets used to mimic disease in humans, US CDC says - Reuters
articles.description: The bird flu virus strain that infected a Texas dairy farm worker in March was lethal to ferrets in experiments designed to mimic the disease in humans, the U.S. Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) reported on Friday.

articles.title: Night owls beware: Late bedtimes linked to higher risk of depression and anxiety - PsyPost
articles.description: Staying up late, even if you're a night owl, is linked to higher risks of depression and anxiety. This surprising study suggests that an earlier bedtime could improve mental health, regardless of natural sleep preferences.
